content: In europe our off-by-one timezone got un-off-by-one'd a few days ago, while the u.s. timezone is still off-by-one and will only be un-off-by-one'd in a few days from now, introducing a relative off-by-one timezone difference between across the atlantic making a mess of our calendars with meetings that are off-by-one or not depending on where you are and what timezone the meeting was attached to.

Last two times this mess happened we just skipped the meeting to avoid the confusion until a week later when everything is in sync again ^^'

Should we do the same this week?
